summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas will hold a Council Briefing meeting on May 15, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. This meeting serves as a budget workshop and includes both in-person and virtual attendance options.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes the approval of minutes from the May 1, 2024, City Council meeting, consideration of appointments to various boards and commissions, and a report from the Ad Hoc City Council Canvassing Committee regarding the results of the May 4, 2024, special bond election.

**Important Details**:  
A significant focus will be on the FY 2024-25 and FY 2025-26 Biennial Budget Update, which will be presented during the meeting. Additionally, there will be a discussion on recommended amendments to the 2024 Charter Review Commissionâ€™s Final Report.

**Action Items**:  
The Council will seek approval for the minutes from the previous meeting, the appointments to boards and commissions, and the adoption of a resolution accepting the canvassing committee's report on the bond election results. The meeting may also include a closed session to discuss personnel matters and other confidential topics as outlined in the agenda. 

Overall, this meeting aims to address key financial planning and governance issues for the City of Dallas.
